title: Jateng
author: Jateng
created_time: January 31, 2023, 06:27:22 AMLast edit: February 02, 2023, 06:18:12 PM by Jateng
content: · WEBSITE · ANN · TWITTER · FACEBOOK · TELEGRAM ·The bounty program was launched on 31 of Jan 2023 and will run until 31.04.2023Fitcoin bounty first round will take place in the 30 of Jan 13:00 GMT 2023 and last for 30 feb 30 Days 3.5 million $FPC are allocated for this round15 million $FPC are allocated for this Bounty in three round. We are delighted to reward you for each users all your hard work and commitment!As mentioned in our ICO ANNOUNCEMENT We set double rewards for to parcipiate in bounty program. Its One-time direct rewards for you subscribers or any buyer, which will dependence on Audit score any social (respectively)Platform - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any other. Time approval 48 hours. Minimal 1-3 you subscribers must to percipient become of project according to your ref-feral link (minimal deposit) Audit score your social-media accounts = 70-80% minimum. And percentage of your ref feral linkWe will contact you through the channel you have helped us with in our campaign. So keep an eye out for our private messages on Facebook and Twitter. If you participated through a different channel, we will send you an email to the address you provided when applying to join our campaign. All payout will be making in the ways you specified within max 72 hourslimitation? 10% cutting in stakes and other 5% will be distributed in respectively you refferal rewards.   community: Twitter, Facebook, Discord, instagramm and..community:  First 150 approved participantsTelegram: First 150 approved participantsArticle: Top 30 articles will be selectedVideo: Top 30 videos will be selected● Video:        25%● article:           25%● community:    20%● Telegram:       20%● Signature:      10%Rewards:• Have more than 500-1000   followers:  1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week• Have more than 1000-3000  followers:  2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week• Have more than 3000-5000  followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /week• Have more than 5000-10000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /week• Have more than 10000-more followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:Must have at least 100 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.Follow and like the official Twitter accountHave to make new tweets and retweets per week (maximum 1-3 tweet and 1-3 retweet per day).Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks.Participants must use #cryptofit #fitnesmining #fitonika #fitmining #fitcoin hashtags in every retweet and tweet.Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the telegram channel or private message bitcointalk or email - Please, send report all the links to your work every week as a new post/message - to email or telegram or PM DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! YOU MEMBERSHIP WILL BE REJECTED PAYOUTHow to join::1. Join the official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application:Rewards:•Have more than 100-300   followers:  1 stake per one tweet or retweet •Have more than 300-1000  followers:  2 stake per one tweet or retweet •Have more than 1000-3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet •Have more than 3000-5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet •Have more than 5000-more followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweetRules::Must have at least 100 followers and make privacy settings open for your pageFollow and like the official Twitter accountHave to make new tweets and retweets per week (maximum 1-3 tweet and 1-3 retweet per day)Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networksParticipants must use #cryptofit #fitnesmining #fitonika #fitmining #fitcoin hashtags in every retweet and tweetQuestions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the telegram channel or private message bitcointalk or emailPlease, send report all the links to your work every week as a new post/message - to email or telegram or PM DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! YOU MEMBERSHIP WILL BE REJECTED PAYOUTHow to join::1. Join the official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application on bounty page:Rewards:•Excellent:  5 stakes (High quality video and >10000 subscribers)•very hight: 4 stakes (VH quality video and >5000 subscribers)•High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >3000 subscribers )•Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)•Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and 500-1000 subscribers Rules::have at least 100+ youtube subscribers Your subscribers have to activites comment on to yuor channel - last comment musent send not be late 1-2 month All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website or Twitter page, Telegram group, or any other social media. The video description must include 20-50+ words of original text about the company F WE PROVIDE GIVE ADDITIONAL REWARDS WHERE THERE ARE THREE PRIZES PLACE. WE WILL HOLD A COMPETITION BETWEEN PARCIPIENTS IN TELEGRAM.  WHO WILL GET THE MOST VOTE ON GENERAL ELECTION BETWEEN PARCIPIENT BOUNTY COMPANY THAT WILL RECIEIVE FIRST PRIZE, NEXT VOTERS NEXT VOTERS FOR COUNT ELECTORATE GET SECOND PRIZE, AND LAST GET THREE  1 PLACE - 3000$ 2 PLACE - 2000$ 3 PLACE - 1000$How to join::1. Join the official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application on bounty page:Rewards: Exclent quality: 5  ( need it have to personally blog or direct newspaper of cryptocurrency with high rating score )•High quality:    4 stakes•Good quality:    3 stakes•Average quality: 2 stake•Poor quality:    1 stake (copy past is allowed)Rules::Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress, lj, newsArticles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 wordsArticles should be published on next blogs or news feed/line place: Steemit, Medium, Reddit and LinkedIn and other public placesYour account on Medium/Reddit... must be at least 1-month-old and original3. Each participant can write 1 article onlyContent must contain keyword on a relevant focus project: project features, project info, goals, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etcArticles not should be removed before finished bounty compainPublished Articles must include at least 1-3 images of the project,  project's websiteMedium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social mediaHow to join::1. Join the official Group.2. All participants must join bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application form on bounty page:Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (5 stakes/week)● 5 stakes once for wearing a "Your Name | FITONIKA” + LOGO.Rules::Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | Fitcoin Fan''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.Replace your profile picture with Fitcoin Logo.Write at least 1 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/FlokiChristmasOfficial and 4 messages weekly in other crypto-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.Deleted messages will not be counted.Report your telegram message links weekly.You must wear Fitcoin avatar and text until the end of the campaign.How to join::1. Join the official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join Bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application on bounty page:Rewards:*Hero / Legendary: 2.5 stakes    *Sr. Member: 2 stakes    *Full Member: 1,5 stakes    *Member: 1 stakes    *Jr. Member: 0,5 stakesRules::Use the official FPC Avatar and Signatures provided below.If you rank up, you must change your signature and notify us by posting in a bounty thread or by Private Message.Spamming, duplicate and low-quality posts is strictly prohibited and will not be counted.A post must be on topic and constructive with a minimum of 80 characters per post.Minimum post per week should be 10 to be eligible in receiving your weekly stakes.You are not allowed to drop signatures or advertise other sites in your signatures.Posts should be spread across the week, if you post all 10 in 1-2 days you will receive 0 stakes.Registrations with multiple accounts are forbidden and lead to a permanent ban with no reward.Posts in Politics & Society, Games and Rounds, Off-Topic, Archival, Local, bounty threads will not be counted.Negative trust will not be accepted.How to join::1. Join the official Group.2. All participants must join bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application on bounty page:Rewards: • Translation of ANN thread+Bounty Thread: 5 stakes (~500$)• Moderation/Management: ( 5$ per Valid Post (50 Tokens).)• Whitepaper: 10 stakes• Website: 5 stakesRules:: Translators must update his/her thread at least 3 post per week (You can translate devs post in ANN thread or Social Media Account) Using Google translator is prohibited. If we discover its use at any time, you will be excluded from the bounty. Spam post will not be countedTranslators must make changes to ANN + Bounty + website + WP within 24 hours, after our request You have 3 days to translate ANN + Bounty threads, 3 days for site, and 6 days for WP All languages are accepted!.How to join::1. Join the official Group.2. All participants must join bounty Telegram Group.3. Send application on bounty page:• Get approval for your reservation, I will PM all eligible participants• After being accepted and completing the translation, post in this thread with a link to the translated thread
